meta.title: Golden Retriever vs German Shepherd: Breed Comparison
meta.description: Golden Retriever vs GSD: One is a lover, one is a protector. Which breed fits your lifestyle? Detailed comparison of temperament and needs.

comparison_points.title: Temperament
comparison_points.verdict: Goldens love everyone; GSDs are devoted to their family but wary of strangers.

comparison_points.title: Exercise Needs
comparison_points.verdict: GSDs need a 'job' and mental stimulation; Goldens are happy with fetch and walks.

comparison_points.title: Shedding
comparison_points.verdict: Both shed heavily. Get a good vacuum.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
